climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Non-slip Backing】 Our non slip washable area rug are designed with high-quality backing material to ensure that you and your family stay safe and stable. It provides added safety, This makes it safer for you to play during daily use. With our non slip area rugs, you won't have to worry about slips or stumbles, making it ideal for families with elderly members as well.

【Machine Washable Rug】 This machine washable area rugs 5x7 is the best choice for high traffic areas at home. This area rugs is machine washable and very easy to care. Use a broom or vacuum cleaner to remove dust or hair for daily care, if excess liquid remains or dirt on the surface of the rug and you want your rug to to be thoroughly clean, Machine wash with cold water on gentle cycle(not to add bleach), air dry or dry on air-only cycle with out heat.

【Well Designed Rugs】This machine area rug 5x7 grounds your space in a modern abstract design, showcases an artful, abstract pattern that complements any room with purposeful distressing. Modern area rug can work for every floor and space, from the living room, bedroom, dining room, entryway, or kitchen. You can always find a washable area rugs ties your home décor together, make your interior decor come alive like never before.

【Durable Comfort】The 5x7 washable rugs are machine woven with finer fiber making them extra soft and comfort than traditional washable area rug. Whether you step on with bare feet or laying on with you, you can feel the warmth and coziness underneath.

【Functional Sizes & Foldable】Our area rug come in a range of functional sizes to suit your decor needs. Our rugs are a great option for daily use in laundry rug, kitchen runner, entryway rug, outdoor area rug for hallways or area rugs for bedroom and living room. When area rug arrives, there may be temporary creases, you can roll the washable rug in the opposite direction and lay it flat on the floor while applying pressure to the carpet, the creases will disappear completely in a few days.

【Contact Us】- Choose the OIGAE machine washable rug, we provide 1 year warranty, you can buy it with no worries. If you feel uncomfortable during use, please contact us as soon as possible, we will provide after-sales service quickly---Find order---Contact seller. This modern area rug makes a fine birthday gift, holiday present, Christmas gift, Valentine’s Day gift, anniversary gift, or Father’s Day or Mother’s Day gift.

TIPS: When area rug arrives, there may be temporary creases, you can roll the washable rug in the opposite direction and lay it flat on the floor while applying pressure to the carpet, the creases will disappear completely in a few days.
body.description: OIGAE Abstract Modern Area Rug Add Color to Your Life Our rugs come in a variety of colors, sizes and patterns to fit every home decor style. You can put it in any room of your house: living room, bedroom, kitchen, dining room or home office. Rubber-backed area rugs are non-slip to prevent your seniors, from slipping while moving around. Washable rugs protect your floors from dust and wear and tear, and are the best choice for everyday indoor high traffic. The foldable area rug is convenient for you to change at any time. You can be fold it up for storage when changing seasons to save more space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Aesthetically pleasing and high quality. Was surprised that it did not move on both hard wood and tile floors. Would have loved to purchase a longer length for my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really soft and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: This was on thinner side but it's softness and great quality make up for that, great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Pretty and Wasable
reviews.reviewText: Love the colors and texture, and it will definitely fit in a stanowasher without an agitator, but it’s thinner than I expected. It does have a rubber, non- slip backing but it provides no padding underneath. I added a rug pad but now I have to buy non slip grips so I don’t break my neck. Still a good rug for those with dogs and kids (or grandkids) and it’s really pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how lightweight it is! Its a light color but does well dirt & stains, material is very easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The price for this quality is unreal
reviews.reviewText: Cat approved lol! We can’t wait to get our table and chairs in. We are so shocked for the price that the quality of this rug. It doesn’t slip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Folded 18 times and arrived a Wrinkled Mess!
reviews.reviewText: I would have not even given a 1 Star other than price. Clearly you get what you pay for. I purchased 3 of these rugs and was expecting them to each arrive rolled up in a 6’ tall shipping tube. Instead, they folded the lightweight rug 18 times creating an insane amount of wrinkles that I’ll never be able to get out. On top of the wrinkled mess, beware these rugs should be marketed as big bath towels because they are only as thick as a beach towel. I intended to put these in my commercial office but like I said, they are way too thin and lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I think it’s a good size and I like the pattern but there is two weird blue stains. It smells like dish soap. Not sure how dish soap would get in the bag though!!! Hopefully that’s all it is and it cleans out because returning it sounds like a headache!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicer than expected
reviews.reviewText: the colors are amazing, it's low-pile but really soft.
